data.title: cdetools: Tools for Conditional Density Estimates
data.name: cdetools

evidence: "cdetools: Tools for Conditional Density Estimates â€” Provides tools for evaluating conditional density estimates in R and Python. Calculates CDE loss, coverge, and HPD coverage."

The README describes domain-specific statistical tools (conditional density estimation) used in research applications ("with applications to photometric redshifts and likelihood-free cosmological inference"), indicating it directly contributes to research analyses.

No installation instructions via package managers, containers, or binaries are mentioned; only the project description and citation are given, implying distribution primarily via the source repository.
